txt.en: 'Hullo! Would you like to be an \qAcquaintance\q of Théodred's Riders? Well look no further! Completion of this quest should do that just for you.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon Théodred's Riders will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of Théodred's Riders.
